channel.title: Css Selectors on Sam Adesoga's Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Css Selectors on Sam Adesoga's Personal Blog

item.title: css selectors in place of xpath for selenium locators
item.description: I have always resolved to using xpath whenever i am creating selenium scripts and i need to do locate elements with no ‘id’. Well as you would probably know, xpath executes so slow on IE. For intance i have a test suite that would run in 1hr 30mins on firefox/ safari but the same test suites would take over 4hrs to run to completion on IE.So with the help of a colleagues, i have been using css selectors from last week and i can say this has drastically improved the speed of our test and you would notice too much difference between IE and FF/Safari anymore.
